title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Federal judge strikes down Trump order targeting the law firm Perkins Coie

items.title: The Trump administration says it will cut EPA staffing to Reagan-era levels
items.description: EPA announced plans to reorganize the agency, moving science-focused staff into different roles and reducing the overall number of employees.

items.title: Brazil social security minister latest to quit in major pension fraud scandal
items.description: The scheme allegedly saw pensioners defrauded of payments, with the diverted money shared among corrupt officials.

items.title: 'I saved my ID card and my dog': Israel expands demolitions of West Bank refugee homes
items.description: Jumaa Zawayda didn't know if his home was among those destroyed after Israel ordered thousands to evacuate Jenin.

items.title: Denver oldest serving fire station home to first Black firefighters
items.description: Serving the community meant clearing racial hurdles. And sometimes entailed paying the highest price in the line of duty.

items.title: India and Pakistan are in crisis again - here's how they de-escalated in the past
items.description: The way events unfolded after the Pulwama bombing and Pahalgam killings is strikingly similar, says a former diplomat.

items.title: Pirates fan who fell over wall at PNC Park identified as young man who "made a lasting impact on the South Allegheny community"
items.description: Kavan Markwood is the fan​ who fell from the 21-foot Clemente Wall in right field at PNC Park in Pittsburgh on Wednesday.

items.title: 2 wounded in shooting at Spartan College in Inglewood; suspect in custody
items.description: Two of the victims were believed to be female employees of the college, Inglewood's mayor told CBS News Los Angeles.

items.title: Department of Justice suing Colorado, Denver over "sanctuary" policies
items.description: The Department of Justice has filed a lawsuit against the state of Colorado, the city of Denver and a list of local leaders.

items.title: Canada's Carney offers strategic invite to King ahead of Trump meeting
items.description: In his first news conference since the federal election, the PM laid out his approach to talks with his US counterpart.

items.title: Seven killed in tour bus crash near Yellowstone National Park
items.description: A pickup truck and a tourist van collide on a highway near the famous attraction in eastern Idaho.
